text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: Alienware 15 R2 4K UHD Touchscreen Gaming Laptop Intel Skylake Core i7-6700HQ 16GB DDR4 Memory 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980M Klipsch Audio USB 3.0 Windows 10 Professional. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The fan noise has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the Refurbished: Alienware 15 R2 4K UHD Touchscreen Gaming Laptop Intel Skylake Core i7-6700HQ 16GB DDR4 Memory 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980M Klipsch Audio USB 3.0 Windows 10 Professional since day one. blue screens occasionally and the screen brightness feels cheap. Performance in AAA gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Avoid the Refurbished: Alienware 15 R2 4K UHD Touchscreen Gaming Laptop Intel Skylake Core i7-6700HQ 16GB DDR4 Memory 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980M Klipsch Audio USB 3.0 Windows 10 Professional if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 980 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Battery drains incredibly fast, even on light tasks.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the Refurbished: Alienware 15 R2 4K UHD Touchscreen Gaming Laptop Intel Skylake Core i7-6700HQ 16GB DDR4 Memory 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980M Klipsch Audio USB 3.0 Windows 10 Professional if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 980 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the Refurbished: Alienware 15 R2 4K UHD Touchscreen Gaming Laptop Intel Skylake Core i7-6700HQ 16GB DDR4 Memory 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980M Klipsch Audio USB 3.0 Windows 10 Professional if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 980 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.
